subject: I want to let you that we rece
body:
I want to let you that we receive another email right now from a young man called Mr. Jackson Robert he said that you got an accident and died yesterday that before you died in the hospital you gave him the power of attorney to inherit your fund worth $20.8 million dollars in our custody and he said that he is ready to pay for the VAT charge duty so that we can hand over the fund to him, 
we need a confirmation to this and 
if we do not hear from you within a couple of 6 hours we are going to take the action by handing him over the fund
.Remember to send him your Full information to avoid wrong transfer such as:
Receiver's Name_______________
Address: ____
Country: ____
Phone Number: _
ID Card
:_____________
Best Regard
Contact Name: John Frank
Director of Homeland security

subject: Re: I want to let you that we rece
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it comes as quite a surprise. I am alive and well, so there must be some sort of misunderstanding or mistake here.

Could you please provide me with more details about this young man, Mr. Jackson Robert? How did he come to know about my situation and the supposed power of attorney? It's important for me to understand the full picture before taking any action.

Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could clarify what VAT charge duty Mr. Robert is referring to. I want to make sure that everything is handled correctly and legally.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Brendan

So I want you to reconfirm your information and the needed $50 for (VAT) Because it's the only thing that delaying your fund.

I appreciate your help in clarifying this matter for me.
